thread.title: Deutsche Bank Posts Sharp Fall in Profit Amid Vast Overhaul

author: Jenny Strasburg
title: Deutsche Bank Posts Sharp Fall in Profit Amid Vast Overhaul

organizations.name: deutsche bank posts sharp fall in profit amid vast overhaul deutsche bank ag

text:
Deutsche Bank AG, beaten down by lagging performance, said it will retreat from trading and lending businesses dominated by Wall Street banks while asking investors for faith that its new chief executive can succeed where others have failed.
Thursday’s message—which came in tandem with disappointing first-quarter earnings—echoed elements of the German lender’s strategy pronouncements when John Cryan took over as CEO in 2015, and again a year ago when the bank raised $8.5 billion in capital.
... RELATED VIDEO A Brief History of Retail Banking The retail banking industry is undergoing another major shift, and the future looks high-tech, sophisticated, and, for big banks, very urban. So what has changed? Photo: Shaumbé Wright/The Wall Street Journal To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
